entry.source: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-63}{F813,1,417205}What is it? If this is about handing{F801}out Reds, the Ashura-kai haven't{F801}told me anything.{F801}{F802}Mastema hasn't said anything about{F801}it, either.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-63}{F813,1,417208}What is it? You want Reds, now?{F801}Even when Tokyo's in such a mess?{F801}{F802}You're a pretty greedy human,{F801}you know. Even without Reds, you're{F801}pretty much just like us.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-63}{F813,1,417208}What is it? You want Reds, now?{F801}Even when Tokyo's in such a mess?{F801}{F802}You're a pretty greedy human,{F801}you know. Even without Reds, you're{F801}pretty much just like us.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-132}{F813,1,413207}...Ah, I see four lively humans{F801}before me!{F801}{F802}But I have a contract with Tayama.{F801}In exchange for Reds, I won't attack{F801}humans.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-132}{F813,1,413207}...Ah, I see four lively humans{F801}before me!{F801}{F802}But I have a contract with Tayama.{F801}In exchange for Reds, I won't attack{F801}humans.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-132}{F813,1,413208}The Sabbaths seems to have been{F801}purged in the lands above, but as{F801}long as people live, demons will too.{F801}{F802}I shall spread the Sabbath in those{F801}lands, as well. Here, in this Tokyo{F801}outside of God's blessing...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-132}{F813,1,413206}The sons of man have gained their own{F801}world, and they're going to expell{F801}the demons.{F801}{F802}Those who have sensed the change in{F801}time have been leaving in droves.{F801}{F802}I will stay here for now, but{F801}eventually...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-145}{F813,1,494105}ME TIRED OF REDS.{F801}WANT TO EAT REAL MEAT.{F801}{F802}TONS OF REAL MEAT OUTSIDE.{F801}I GO EAT MEAT OUTSIDE.{F801}NO...?{F801}
